ModMetadata.Name: Beef's Longer Orbital Periods
ModMetadata.Author: TheRealBeef
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Beef's Longer Orbital Periods[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersLaunchPad Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
This plugin gives you control over the length of the day/night cycle in Stationeers. You can set it really fast, really slow, however you want.
If you don't want to update the value in StationeersLaunchPad config, it also supports writing values with the console, these are saved to the config file and so don't need to be updated again every time you load the game.
It should work as a serverside-only mod, not requiring clients to have it installed. Automatically disables its patch if it detects you're connecting to someone elses world to reduce possible sheninangans.
Press F3 to open the console and use the [b]time[/b] command. - To see current settings: [b]time[/b] - To set a new multiplier: [b]time [i]multiplier[/i][/b]
Settings are automatically saved to your config file and persist between game sessions.
[b]Examples:[/b] - [b]time 0.5[/b] (10-minute day) - [b]time 1.0[/b] (20-minute day - game default) - [b]time 3.0[/b] (1-hour day - mod default) - [b]time 6.0[/b] (A 2-hour day)
[b]Time Commands[/b]
- [b]time[/b] - Show current settings - [b]time [i]multiplier[/i][/b] - Set a custom multiplier - [b]time real-moon[/b] - 29.53x (~10 hours) - [b]time real-mars[/b] - 1.027x (~20.5 min) - [b]time real-europa[/b] - 3.551x (~1 hr 11 min) - [b]time real-venus[/b] - 116.75x (~39 hours) - [b]time real-mimas[/b] - 0.942x (~18.8 min)
[h2]Plant Scaling[/h2]
By default, the mod does not affect plant growth or light/darkness requirements.
[b]Growth Speed Scaling[/b] - Three modes are available: - [b]Disabled[/b] - Vanilla plant growth speed - [b]UseDayLength[/b] - Plants grow slower by the same multiplier as day length - [b]Custom[/b] - Use a separate multiplier just for plant growth
[b]Light/Dark Requirement Scaling[/b] - When enabled, plant light and darkness requirements per day are multiplied by the day length multiplier.
[b]Plant Commands[/b]
- [b]plants[/b] - Show current plant settings - [b]plants growth off[/b] - Disable growth scaling (vanilla) - [b]plants growth on[/b] - Scale growth by day length - [b]plants growth [i]value[/i][/b] - Use custom growth multiplier - [b]plants light on|off[/b] - Toggle light/dark requirement scaling
[b]Note:[/b] This mod only affects the sun's orbital period and does not change the duration or frequency of storms.
Source Code: https://github.com/TheRealBeef/Stationeers-Longer-Orbital-Periods
ModMetadata.ChangeLog:
3.0.0: - Add config options to menu - Add presets for moon, mars, europa, venus, and mimas - Add plant growth scaling (this can be set independently of day length if desired) - Add plant light/darkness scaling option
2.0.0: - Complete rewrite to update to current Stationeers. - Implemented console command system to make it easier since we don't have a slider anymore.
